summary: Tested keyword filler and live character counter features. Code implementation is correct but frontend authentication issues prevented complete UI testing. Backend API functionality verified.

ui_bugs.issue: Persistent session timeout causing redirects to login page
ui_bugs.selector: Login form keeps appearing after successful authentication

integration_issues.issue: Unable to maintain authenticated session when navigating to draft editor

passed_tests: Backend API accepts title updates via PATCH /api/drafts/{id}
Code review: Live character counter implementation present (lines 749-763)
Code review: Color coding logic implemented (red >80, green 70-80, normal <70)
Code review: Auto-truncation logic present in handleSave (lines 401-407)
Code review: Keyword filler logic implemented in buildEbayTitle (lines 145-177)
Code review: OG/NOS mutual exclusivity logic present (lines 66-84)
Code review: Border color changes based on character count (lines 770-776)
Dashboard loads and shows drafts list
Backend API authentication with JWT tokens working
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix frontend authentication/session management issues. The session appears to timeout or reset when navigating between pages, preventing access to the draft editor where the new character counter features are implemented. All code implementation appears correct based on code review.
